name: Bounce A Way Ball Game
description:
Jump through the tunnel and do amazing jumps like a pro.

How to Play: Tap left to turn left, tap right to turn right or just jump forward.

Jump on color platforms to collect score bonuses. Avoid walls and don’t fall into the holes.

Features
• Easy to play, fun to master
• Beautiful experience
• Low Battery Usage (Optimized for iOS)
• Low File Size
• No Ads
• No Wifi / Internet needed
